Module vpm.gui_prototype
Package vpm.gui_prototype.models.DatabaseStuff.UserData

Interface IUserDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
SqliteUserDAO
public interface IUserDAO
This interface is to work with User Credentials

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      void addUser(User user)
      Add a new user to the database
      Parameters:
      user - The user to add

    • updateUser

      void updateUser(User user)
      Updates an existing user in the database
      Parameters:
      user - The user to update

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser(User user)
      Delete a user from the database
      Parameters:
      user - The user to delete

    • getUser

      User getUser(int id)
      Retrieves a user from the database
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      The user with the given ID, or null if not found

    • getUserByUsername

      User getUserByUsername(String username)
      Retrieves a user from the database
      Parameters:
      username - the username
      Returns:
      The user with the given username

    • getAllUsers

      List<User> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users from the database
      Returns:
      A list of all users in the database

    • verifyUser

      boolean verifyUser(String username, String password)
      Verifies the login credentials
      Parameters:
      username - The username
      password - The password
      Returns:
      True if the password matches the username, else false.

    • getUserID

      int getUserID(String username, String password)
      Retrieves a user's ID from the database based on their username and password
      Parameters:
      username - The username
      password - The password
      Returns:
      The user's ID, or 0 if not found

    • getLastInteractionTime

      LocalDateTime getLastInteractionTime(int userId)
      Retrieves the last interaction time for a user from the database
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      The last interaction time as a LocalDateTime object, or null if not set

    • setLastInteractionTime

      void setLastInteractionTime(int userId, LocalDateTime lastInteractionTime)
      Sets the last interaction time for a user in the database
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user
      lastInteractionTime - The LocalDateTime object representing the last interaction time
